00015 // ConnectConfigService
00016 class ConnectConfigService : public BasicConnectService, public lsf::basic::Singleton<ConnectConfigService> {
00017 public:
00018     using config_reload_func = std::function<void()>;
00019 
00020 public:
00021     ConnectConfigService() : BasicConnectService(conf::SERVICE_TYPE_CONFIG_CENTER) {}
00022     void SetConfigServiceAddress(std::string const& address);
00023     bool GetAllServerConfig(google::protobuf::RepeatedPtrField<conf::Server>& configs);
00024 
00025     template<typename HandlerType>
00026     void AddGameConfigReloadHandle(HandlerType&& handler) {
00027         _game_config_reload_func_set.push_back(std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00028     }
00029 
00030     template<typename HandlerType>
00031     void AddDeployConfigReloadHandle(HandlerType&& handler) {
00032         _deploy_config_reload_func_set.push_back(std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00033     }
00034 
00035 protected:
00036     bool InitServerConfig();
00037     bool InitGameConfig();
00038 
00039     // do not init config from server config
00040     // because server config is not init yet
00041     virtual bool OnInitConfig() { return true; }
00042     virtual void OnConnectionCreate(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket);
00043 
00044 private:
00045     std::vector<config_reload_func> _game_config_reload_func_set;
00046     std::vector<config_reload_func> _deploy_config_reload_func_set;
00047 
00048 };

00053 public:
00054     ConnectClientMsgTransferService() : BasicConnectService(conf::SERVICE_TYPE_CLIENT_MSG_TRANSFER) {}
00055     virtual void OnConnectionCreate(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket);
00056     virtual void OnConnectionMessage(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, std::string& content);
00057 
00058     bool TransferResponse(Session& session);
00059     bool TransferMessageByConnId(uint32_t conn_id, msg::CS& message);
00060     bool TransferMessageByConnIds(google::protobuf::RepeatedField<uint32_t> const& conn_ids, msg::CS& message);
00061     msg::ConnSvrInfo const& GetConnSvrInfo() const { return _conn_svr_info; }
00062 
00063 private:
00064     msg::ConnSvrInfo _conn_svr_info;
00065 };

00069 class ConnectServerMsgTransferService : public BasicConnectService, public lsf::basic::Singleton<ConnectServerMsgTransferService> {
00070 public:
00071     ConnectServerMsgTransferService() : BasicConnectService(conf::SERVICE_TYPE_SERVER_MSG_TRANSFER) {}
00072     virtual bool OnRun();
00073     virtual void OnConnectionCreate(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket);
00074     virtual void OnConnectionMessage(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, std::string& content);
00075 
00076     bool TransferResponse(Session& session);
00077     bool TransferMessageById(conf::ENServerType server_type, uint32_t server_id, msg::SS& message);
00078     bool TransferMessageByHash(conf::ENServerType server_type, uint64_t hash_id, msg::SS& message);
00079     bool TransferMessageByBroadCast(conf::ENServerType server_type, msg::SS& message);
00080     bool TransferMessageByRandom(conf::ENServerType server_type, msg::SS& message);
00081     bool TransferMessageByRandomExceptId(conf::ENServerType server_type,uint32_t except_id, msg::SS& message);
00082     void PostInternalMessage(msg::SS& message);
00083     void PostAsyncInternalMessage(msg::SS& message);
